# Variation in and Correlation between Intrinsic rate of Increase and Carrying Capacity
 Nora Underwood
 
 January 2007
 
 The American Naturalist
 
## Purpose of Study
 
 - Information about variation in intrinsic rate of increase and carrying capacity, as well as the correlation between these parameters, is necessary in order to fully understand the dynamics of a given population.
